channel.title: NCP's always facing south
channel.description:
My NCP's are facing south & I can't find out the problem[img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/post/exclamation.gif[/img]
Does anyone know how to make them face North, West & East?

item.title: NCP's always facing south
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

did i say i understand it? I said I’m not experienced enough to attemp a handler wich also means i have no idea what I’m doing. i was making a suggestion, wow be a fucking know-it-all. Asshole

Read full topic

item.title: NCP's always facing south
item.dc:creator: @xema xema
item.description:
@xema wrote:

[quote=“i nelson i, post:9, topic:116019”]its like that wid objects so i thouhgt wud be same, n my autospawn doesnt have the

id name n shit across top[/quote]

If your server doesn’t handle the object Identifiers, then you’re saying your objects are undefined, correct?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2008, 12:18:19 am[/size][hr][quote=“i nelson i, post:9, topic:116019”]its like that wid objects so i thouhgt wud be same, n my autospawn doesnt have the

id name n shit across top[/quote]

If your server doesn’t handle the object Identifiers, then you’re saying your objects are undefined, correct?

[quote=“pwnedurmom, post:8, topic:116019”][quote author=i nelson i link=topic=165304.msg2450884#msg2450884 date=1221962253]
lmfao at all them posts…you do this;

spawn = 2263 3017 4824 0 3021 4828 2975 4820 1
^ ^

change 1 of the numbers arrow pointing at, its the direction but not sure which 1. i think its the last 1
[/quote]

LMFAO @ your retarted ass. the first # you are pointing at is the height level. The second one is the walk type. Now, please, go fuck yourself.
EDIT: How the hell you get rep is a fucking mystery to me. You have 17 rep, BUT YOU CAN’T EVEN FUCKING READ THE TOP OF YOUR AUTOSPAWN! HOLY SHIT.

on topic… Noone has found a fix for this yet, but i half agree with the guy that said a handler could fix this. Someone should make a “NPCFHandler.java” and see what they can do. If not, post their results and let someone else have a shot at it. I’m not experienced enough to attempt a handler. I’m still new.[/quote]

My way is correct, that proves you don’t understand your server and its “npcs” array.

Read full topic

item.title: NCP's always facing south
item.dc:creator: @xema xema
item.description:
@xema wrote:

(INSERT NPC).direction = (INT);
(INSERT NPC).dirUpdateRequired = true;

Read full topic

item.title: NCP's always facing south
item.dc:creator: @Zederation Zederation
item.description:
@Zederation wrote:

OK, this has got to be the biggest problem the RuneScape Private Server community has ever seen, i have about 50 different downloaded Server Sources and not one of them has an NPC facing a direction other than south, loads of people are posting questions on this and i have read loads of them, nobody has posted an answer and this is a really annoying problem. Now all we need is an experienced Java Game Developer to come on this page and sort this problem out, now someone please help!

Read full topic

item.title: NCP's always facing south
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

[quote=“HPC_Jarod, post:1, topic:116019”]My NCP’s are facing south & I can’t find out the problem

Does anyone know how to make them face North, West & East?[/quote]Open up NPC.java, search through the ints on top for the int “direction”, that’s the int you need to edit, somehow.

Search for the void process.
below that, search for the first “if (npcs[i].IsDead == false) {”
right below that add something like

if(npcs[i].absX == coordinate && npcs[i].absY == coordinate){ npcs[i].direction = number }I dont know if this would work, i hope it does.
I dont know which number is which direction, try 0,1, and 2. maybe the directions are same as for objects.

Read full topic
